hanzi-su-wiki:
苗

Значения

Рассада, сеянец; рисовая рассада; вакцина

Мнемоника

Рассада похожа на молодую траву 艹 и высевается в поле 田.

purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Grass 艹 growing in a field 田
purpleculture_examples:
疫苗 [ yì miáo ]: vaccine
树苗 [ shù miáo ]: sapling
苗族 [ miáo zú ]: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
苗圃 [ miáo pǔ ]: Miao Pu (1977-), PRC actress
苗圃 [ miáo pǔ ]: plant nursery; seedbed
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 田 [ tián ] field, farm, arable land; cultivated
heisig_chinese_memo: If you plant seedlings in a rice FIELD eventually they will FLOWER.
heisig_story: To avoid confusion with the image of rice seedlings to appear later, we shall take these seedlings out of their agricultural setting in the rice fields and into the frame of Brave New World surgery, where "ideas" or "values" are being implanted into brains like seedlings to insure a harmonious society. Then you need only imagine them taking root and breaking out into flower right through the tops of the skulls of people walking around on the streets.
koohiiStory1: If you plant seedlings in a FIELD eventually they will FLOWER.
koohiiStory2: Crap! There are flowers in the rice field... Who let those seedlings get in there?!
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Flowers that grow in a rice paddy only live to be seedlings. Once they sprout, they're plucked away to make room for more rice. Poor little seedlings.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the seedlings growing among the rice plants. Once they bloom they'll be picked, so let's hope they stay small as long as they can.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The seedlings try their best to blend in by referring to themselves as myou (みょう), you know, me and you combined. That's myou.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Listen to the little seedlings say myou over and over. Too bad the farmers can tell they aren't rice plants.
Ru_trainchinese:
miáo: (сущ) росток, всход, побег; потомок
miáo: (графема) признаки тенденции; молодняк (некоторых домашних животных); вакцина; росток, всходы; название этнической группы
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grass (艹) in the rice field (田) is a seedling
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you plant seedlings in a rice FIELD eventually they will FLOWER.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "艸" from " field ", like the shape of seedlings growing on the field, the original meaning is seedlings. "Shuowen": "Miao, who was born in the field. From the field." Duan Yucai's note: "Miao is the name of He Weixiu, because it is the name of the first born of the tree."

Bronze writing is used as a person’s name, Miao [宀邪]盨: "Miao [宀言] 蛨 (as)盨, its descendants and grandchildren Sun Yongbao."

Qin bamboo slips are used as the original meaning, referring to the new-born seedlings, "Sleeping Tiger Land. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jian 144: "The person who pays the debt (debt) will return to the farmer, and the time of planting and seedling control will be two ten days respectively." The time of Hemiao is 20 days each.

Qin Yin is used as the surname, "Qin Yin Script Compilation": "Miao Wan." "Tong Zhi. Clan Slight Three": "Miao family, surname 𦍋. After Chu doctor Bo Di, Bo Di was punishable by sin, and his son Ben Huang went to the Jin Dynasty, and the Jin people followed the Miao, because he thought it was a clan."

In the handed down literature, seedling or used as the original meaning refers to seedling. "poetry. Wang Feng. "Miao Li": "He Li Li, the seedlings of He Ji." Kong Yingdashu: "Miaos are not beautiful." " Miao " refers to newborn animals, such as fish fry, pig fry, etc. "Compendium of Materia Medica. Scale Department. "Caviar": "It will be transformed in a few days. It is called a fish fry." Another " miao " also refers to the offspring of a seed, "Guang Ya. "Shi Gu Yi": "Miao, the end also." Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "The first birth of the grass is called the seedling, and the end is the end in the original language, and the seedling is still in seconds." "Chu Ci. "Li Sao": "The seedlings of Emperor Gaoyang Xi, the Emperor Zhen called Boyong." Zhu Xi's note: "The seedlings, the distant grandsons. The seedlings, the stems and leaves of the grass, are born from the roots."

In addition, the "Miao" in modern Chinese is one of the ethnic minorities in my country. More than half of them live in Guizhou Province, while the rest live in Hunan, Yunnan, Guangxi, Sichuan and other places.
humanum_short_description_en: From "艸" from " field ", it looks like a seedling growing on the field, the original meaning is seedling.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」從「田」，象禾苗生長在田上之形，本義是禾苗。《說文》：「苗，艸生於田者。从艸从田。」段玉裁注：「苗本禾未秀之名，因以爲凡艸木初生之名。」

　　金文用作人名，苗[宀姦]盨：「苗[宀姦]乍(作)盨，其子子孫孫永寶用。」

　　秦簡用作本義，指初生的禾苗，《睡虎地．秦律十八種》簡144：「居貲贖責(債)者歸田農，種時、治苗時各二旬。」全句指以勞役抵債貲贖債務的人回家耕作，播種、管理禾苗的時間各二十天。

　　秦印用作姓氏，《秦印文字彙編》：「苗綰。」《通志．氏族略三》：「苗氏，𦍋姓。楚大夫伯棼之後，伯棼以罪誅，其子賁皇奔晉，晉人與之苗，因以為氏。」

　　傳世文獻中，苗或用作本義，指秧苗。《詩．王風．黍離》：「彼黍離離，彼稷之苗。」孔穎達疏：「苗謂禾未秀。」「苗」由初生的穀物引申指初生的動物，如魚苗、豬苗等。《本草綱目．鱗部．魚子》：「數日即化出，謂之魚苗。」另「苗」亦引由有苗裔後代之義，《廣雅．釋詁一》：「苗，末也。」王念孫疏證：「禾之始生曰苗，對本言之則為末也，苗猶秒也。」《楚辭．離騷》：「帝高陽之苗裔兮，朕皇考曰伯庸。」朱熹注：「苗裔，遠孫也。苗者，草之莖葉，根所生也。」

　　另，現代漢語中的「苗族」是我國少數民族之一，半數以上居於貴州省，其餘多居住在湖南、雲南、廣西、四川等地。
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」從「田」，象禾苗生長在田上之形，本義是禾苗。

Ideographic: Grass 艹 growing in a field 田
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 田 [ tián ] field, farm, arable land; cultivated
①初生的植物或没有秀穗的庄稼：禾苗。麦苗。树苗。幼苗。苗子(亦喻继承某种事业的接班人)。苗而不秀(只长苗而不秀穗，喻本身条件虽好，但没有成就)。
②形状像苗的：火苗儿。
③某些初生的饲养的动物：鱼苗。
④能使机体产生免疫力的微生物制剂：疫苗。卡介苗。
⑤子孙后代：苗裔。
⑥中国少数民族，主要分布于贵州、湖南、云南、四川、湖北等省和广西壮族自治区：苗族。苗绣。
⑦姓氏。

苗字的基本解释

苗
miáo
初生的植物或没有秀穗的庄稼：禾苗。麦苗。树苗。幼苗。苗子（亦喻继承某种事业的接班人）。苗而不秀（只长苗而不秀穗，喻本身条件虽好，但没有成就）。
形状像苗的：火苗儿。
某些初生的饲养的动物：鱼苗。
能使机体产生免疫力的微生物制剂：疫苗。卡介苗。
子孙后代：苗裔。
中国少数民族，主要分布于贵州、湖南、云南、四川、湖北等省和广西壮族自治区：苗族。苗绣。
姓。

苗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miáo］
［《廣韻》武瀌切，平宵，明。］
亦作“猫3”。亦作“貓3”。
(1)尚未开花结实的禾类植物。
(2)泛指一般植物之初生者。
(3)指某些初生的动物。
(4)指微露迹象的矿脉。
(5)指禾谷之实。
(6)指事物的因由、端绪、预兆。
(7)后裔；子孙。
(8)民众。
(9)古称夏季田猎。《诗·小雅·车攻》：“之子于苗，選徒囂囂。”毛传：“夏獵曰苗。”《左传·隐公五年》：“故春蒐、夏苗、秋獮、冬狩，皆於農隙以講事也。”杜预注：“苗，爲苗除害也。”一说春猎为苗。《公羊传·桓公四年》：“春曰苗。”
(10)我国古代部族名。也称三苗、有苗。
(11)我国少数民族名。相传为古代三苗部族之后。今分布于贵州、云南、四川、湖南、广西、广东等地。
(12)量词。
(13)姓。

苗字的英文翻译

◎ 苗
seedling, some kinds of young animals, young plant

苗字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　苗； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1022第28
〔古文〕?【唐韻】武儦切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】眉鑣切，?音描。【說文】草生于田者，榖曰苗。凡草初生亦曰苗。【詩·王風】彼黍離離，彼稷之苗。【魏風】碩䑕碩䑕，無食我苗。【註】嘉穀也。　又【爾雅·釋天】夏獵曰苗。【註】爲苗除害也。【詩·小雅】之子于苗，?徒囂囂。　又【書·舜典】?三苗于三危。【史記·夏本紀註】《神異經》：西荒中有人焉，面目手足皆人形，而胳下有翼，不能飛，爲人饕餮，淫?無理，名曰苗民。　又【博雅】衆也。【後漢·鄧皇后紀】損膳解驂，以贍黎苗。　又胤也。【屈原·離騷】帝高陽之苗裔兮。【後漢·?恂傳】功臣苗緒。　又地名。【左傳·襄二十六年】晉人與之苗。【註】苗，晉地。　又山名。【淮南子·修務訓】苗山之鋌。【註】苗山，利金所出也。　又姓。【晉語】苗棼皇，晉大夫。　又【韻補】眉彪切，音繆。【韓愈·楚國夫人墓銘】高陵相漢，義以家酬。遷于南陽，始自郞苗。

苗字的源字形

苗字的起名意思

：指有作为、有才能的人。

seedling
Basic explanation of words
seedling
miáo
Newborn plants or crops without showing ears: grass seedlings. Wheat seedlings. Saplings. seedling. Miao (also known as a successor to inherit a certain cause). Miao but not show (only grow seedlings but not show ears, Yu himself has good conditions, but he has no achievements).
Shaped like a seedling: Huomiaoer.
Certain newborn animals: fry.
Microbial preparations that can make the body produce immunity: vaccines. BCG.
Offspring: Miao.
Chinese ethnic minorities are mainly distributed in Guizhou, Hunan, Yunnan, Sichuan, Hubei and other provinces and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region: the Miao. Miao embroidery.
name.
seedling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miáo］
["Guangyun" Wu Huang cut, Ping Xiao, Ming. ]
Also known as "Cat 3". Also known as "Cat 3".
(1) Grasses that have not yet bloomed and set fruit.
(2) Generally refers to the nascent ones of general plants.
(3) Refers to certain newborn animals.
(4) Refers to mineral veins with slight signs of exposure.
(5) Refers to the fruit of Hegu.
(6) Refers to the cause, thread, and omen of things.
(7) Descendants; descendants.
(8) People.
(9) In ancient times, it was called summer field hunting. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Chegong": "The son of Miao, who chooses to be clamorous." Mao Chuan: "Xia Lie is called Miao." "Zuo Chuan·Yin Gong Five Years": "Gu Chun Sou, Xia Miao, Qiu Sui and winter hunting are all used in the agricultural gap to talk about things.” Du's note: "miao, for the seedlings to eliminate harm." One said that spring hunting is the seedling. "The Story of Gongyang · Huan Gong Four Years": "Spring is called Miao."
(10) The names of the tribes in ancient my country. Also called San Miao, You Miao.
(11) The names of ethnic minorities in our country. According to legend, after the ancient Sanmiao tribe. Now distributed in Guizhou, Yunnan, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong and other places.
(12) Quantifiers.
(13) Last name.

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　 Miao; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1022 28
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Wu Yanqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Eyebrow cut, sound description. [Said the text] The grass is born in the field, and it is called the seedling. Every grass is also called a seedling when it is born. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】Bi Mi Li Li, the seedling of Pi Ji. [Wei Feng] Suo Pi Shuo Pi, no food for my seedlings. [Note] Jia Gu also.　[Erya·Shitian] Xia Lie said Miao. [Note] It is also for seedlings. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The son of Yu Miao, Du Xiaoxiao.　[Book·Shun Dian]? Sanmiao Yu Sanwei. [Historical Records·Xia Benji Annotation] "Shen Yi Jing": There are people in the Western Wilderness, whose faces are humanoids with arms and legs, but they have wings under their arms and cannot fly. They are gluttonous, lewd, unreasonable, and they are called Miao people.　[Bo Ya] People also. [Later Han·Deng Empress Ji] Lose the food to help the Li Miao.　Yin Ye. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】The seed of Emperor Gaoyang. [Later Han·? Xun Chuan] Hero Miao Xu.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang twenty-sixth year] Jin people and their seedlings. [Note] Miao, Jindi.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Huainanzi·Xiuwuxun】The collar of Miaoshan. [Note] Miaoshan, Lijin also came out.　Another last name. [Jin language] Miao Fenghuang, doctor of Jin.　[Rhyme Filling] The eyebrows are cut and cut, and the sound is miao. [Tomb of Han Yu·Mrs. Chu State] Gaoling Xianghan, righteously rewarded with his family. Moved to Nanyang, started from Yin Miao.

seedling
Name meaning
: Refers to a person with deeds and talents.
(缺)
苗 mido
书
字由“艸”(草)和“田”组成,表示
庄稼的幼苗正从田地里生长起来。
本义是“初生的种子植物”。《诗经》:
“彼稷之苗。”《孟子》: “恶秀恐其乱苗
也。”引申为某些初生的动物,如“鱼
苗”等。

前苗苗
(недостаток)
Рассада мидо
Слово состоит из «艸» (трава) и «тянь», что означает, что всходы сельскохозяйственных культур растут с поля.
Первоначальное значение - «зарождающееся семенное растение».
«Книга песен»: «Саженцы Биджи». «Mencius»: «Мяо Е» Распространена на некоторых новорожденных животных, таких как «мальки-мальки» и так далее.

Упрощенные символы

Предпосадочный
miáo
I сущ.
1) всходы, побеги; росток
火苗 языки пламени
2) отпрыск, потомок; молодь
鱼苗 мальки (рыбы)
3) рассада, культура; уст. вакцина
牛痘苗 противооспенная вакцина
4) залежи (металла)
铜苗 залежи меди
5) мяо (народность в юго-западном Китае)
苗瑶 народности мяо и яо
苗疆 районы расселения мяо
II прил.
непослушный, капризный (о ребёнке)
这孩子真苗 этот ребёнок никого не слушается (действительно строптив)
III гл.
1) давать побеги
苗而不秀 дать росток, но не заколоситься (опустоцвете; о рано умершем)
2) * быть на летней охоте; охотиться
之子于苗 те господа ушли на летнюю охоту...
IV собств.
Мяо (фамилия)
Radicals: 艹, 田  (flowers, rice-paddy)
Meaning Mnemonic
Flowers that grow in a rice paddy only live to be seedlings. Once they sprout, they're plucked away to make room for more rice. Poor little seedlings.
Picture the seedlings growing among the rice plants. Once they bloom they'll be picked, so let's hope they stay small as long as they can.
Reading Mnemonic
The seedlings try their best to blend in by referring to themselves as myou (みょう), you know, me and you combined. That's myou.
Listen to the little seedlings say myou over and over. Too bad the farmers can tell they aren't rice plants.
